mapper.select: SELECT prd.*, prd_img.storedThumbNailName thumb, ctg.category_level big_ctg FROM ProductDTO prd INNER JOIN ProductFileDTO prd_img ON prd.pno=prd_img.pno INNER JOIN CategoryDTO ctg ON prd.cno=ctg.cno WHERE prd.cno=#{num} OR ctg.category_level=#{num};

SELECT prd.*, prd_img.storedThumbNailName thumb, ctg.category_level big_ctg FROM ProductDTO prd INNER JOIN ProductFileDTO prd_img ON prd.pno=prd_img.pno INNER JOIN CategoryDTO ctg ON prd.cno=ctg.cno WHERE prd.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product_name}, '%');
SELECT prd.*, prdf.storedFileRootName image FROM ProductDTO prd INNER JOIN ProductFileDTO prdf ON prd.pno = prdf.pno WHERE prd.pno = #{pno};
